RequestTest.Title: query
RequestTest.Request: GET {javelin-url}/query?name=test HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: application/json Connection: keep-alive

RequestTest.Title: get/id
RequestTest.Request: GET {javelin-url}/get/1 HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: application/json Connection: keep-alive

RequestTest.Title: post
RequestTest.Request:
POST {javelin-url}/query?name=test HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: application/json Connection: keep-alive
{ "username": "test", "age": 18 }

RequestTest.Title: error
RequestTest.Request: GET {javelin-url}/error HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: application/json Connection: keep-alive
